title: Coaching / Teaching Stream (http://www.twitch.tv/ecotoxic/profile)
body:
Hello readers,

IGN: ecotoxic

I am roughly top 50 challenger, ADC main. In my stream I want to be explaining my thought process of doing certain actions etc. I may not be best at it yet, but i'm trying be better senpai "teacher". So if like you like to help me out come along and join in stream, if I am not running be sure to follow to know next time i'm going. Highly encourage questions in chat I will read once games are done. (only 1 monitor). 

http://www.twitch.tv/ecotoxic/profile
